description:
Naoto and K4 head toward Yokokawa as the rain plummets down. Haruka says the track from Usui Bridge No. 3 to Yokokawa should be safe since it`s regularly maintained for the opening of the Usui Abt Railway, but the downgrade is steep, they can`t slow down, and the narrow tunnels make it difficult to handle curves... They`re in a serious pinch when Iwaizumi takes action!
Source: crunchyroll
